content: निह्नवः {@--1@} Denial, concealment of knowledge; कार्यः स्वमतिनिह्नवः <ls>Māl. 1. 12</ls>; <ls>Chandr. 5. 27.</ls> {@--2@} Secrecy, concealment in general; <ls>Y. 2. 11</ls> <ls n="Y. 2.">267.</ls> {@--3@} A secret. {@--4@} Mistrust; doubt, suspicion. {@--5@} Wickedness. {@--6@} Atonement, expiation. {@--7@} Excuse, exculpation.
